about_the_game:
NEONPIXEL - Mega Landscape B set consists of two packs.

The first pack is called OLD CONTINENT PACK, and it contains a wide variety of assets such as desert and dry vegetation, burning vegetation, a large collection of different vegetation, marketplaces, desert towns, desert villages, catacombs, pyramids, archaeological excavations, oases, and various lost places.

The second pack is called DARK NIGHT 2 PACK, and it is designed for creating spooky and abandoned locations such as small abandoned islands connected by a bridge, lonely houses or villages, small cemeteries, and dark forests.
*DARK NIGHT 2 PACK is one of the pack from DARK NIGHT series.

Contents

-- OLD CONTINENT--
characters:41 sheet
parallaxes:6 sheet
tilesets:31 sheet

--DARK NIGHT 2 PACK--
characters:17 sheet
tilesets:10 sheet

●Update 2024/1/25
Updated part of MEGA Landscape B Set-Dark Night 2-V2, added new animations and tilesets.

The second pack is called DARK NIGHT 2 PACK, and it is designed for creating spooky and abandoned locations such as small abandoned islands connected by a bridge, lonely houses or villages, small cemeteries, and dark forests.
